resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105996</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105996</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973988</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">UN in Space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">UNO im Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ONU dans l'espace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Un no espaço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">NU nello spazio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η.Ε στο διάστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La O.N.U en espacio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The United Nations visits outer space! Visit the UNISPACE III conference. Learn about the world's treaties and principles of outer space exploration. Visit our links to other space and astronomy sites too.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Nationen Besuche Weltraum! Besuchen Sie 
die UNISPACE III Konferenz. Erlernen Sie über die Verträge und
die Grundregeln der Welt der Weltraumerforschung. Besuchen Sie 
unsere Links zu anderen Platz- und Astronomiesites auch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'espace extra-atmosphérique de visites des 
Nations Unies ! Visitez la conférence d'UNISPACE III. 
Renseignez-vous sur les traités et les principes du monde de 
l'exploration d'espace extra-atmosphérique. Visitez nos liens 
à d'autres sites de l'espace et d'astronomie aussi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O espaço exterior unido das visitas das nações!
Visite a conferência de UNISPACE III. Aprenda sobre os 
tratados e princípios do mundo da exploração do espaço exterior. 
Visite nossas ligações a outros locais do espaço e da 
astronomia demasiado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spazio esterno di chiamate delle Nazioni Unite!
Visiti il congresso di UNISPACE III. Impari circa i 
trattati ed i principii del mondo di esplorazione dello spazio 
esterno. Visiti i nostri collegamenti ad altri luoghi di 
astronomia e dello spazio anche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εξωτερικό διάστημα επισκέψεων Ηνωμένων Εθνών! 
Επισκεφτείτε τη διάσκεψη UNISPACE ΙΙΙ. Μάθετε για 
τις παγκόσμιες συνθήκες και τις αρχές της εξερεύνησης εξωτερικού 
διαστήματος. Επισκεφτείτε τις συνδέσεις μας με άλλες 
περιοχές διαστήματος και αστρονομίας επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡El espacio exterior de las visitas de Naciones 
Unidas! Visite la conferencia de UNISPACE III. Aprenda 
sobre los tratados y los principios del mundo de la exploración del 
espacio exterior. Visite nuestras conexiones a otros sitios del 
espacio y de la astronomía también.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973988</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105996</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/un-in-space</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
